issues.title: GDPR Requirement Non-Compliant: data-minimization
issues.description: The system is non-compliant with GDPR requirement: Collect only necessary data for specified purposes

metadata.evidence: Marketing forms collect excessive personal information

issues.title: GDPR Requirement Partially Compliant: right-to-be-forgotten
issues.description: The system is only partially compliant with GDPR requirement: Implement right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

metadata.evidence: Account deletion exists but some data remains in backups

issues.title: GDPR Partial Compliance
issues.description: The system is only partially compliant with GDPR regulations overall

issues.title: Data Retention Non-Compliance: personalData
issues.description: personalData data is being retained for 730 days, which exceeds the required retention period of 365 days
issues.remediation: Implement a data purging mechanism to automatically delete personalData data after 365 days.
